definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: king of Assyria (prop. [[אסרד]]-, = As. Šulman-as251;aridu, ‘(God) Šulman is chief,’ Schr:ZK ii (1885), 197 ff. Muss-Arnolt:JBL xi (1892). 79);—2Ki 17:3 = 2Ki 18:9; Sal(a)manas(s)ar, Vulgate Salmanasar. This was ´[[שׁ]]: IV, B.C. 727–722, Say:Hast. DB s. v. Johns:Ency. Bib. s. v.
